item.title: First Steps with a Keyboard on ZMK
item.description:
This article provides a guide to help you take your first steps in mastering a keyboard on ZMK. After reading the article, the user will learn how to: manage the keyboard’s power, connect the keyboard to multiple devices, and update the firmware.

Connecting the Keyboard

Step 1. First, turn it on by switching the physical toggle to the “On” position.

Step 2. Next, the halves need to be connected to each other. To do this, simultaneously press the “Reset” button on the bottom of both halves.

item.title: Keyboard Configuration in ZMK keymap-editor
item.description:
Keymap-editor is a powerful tool for configuring keyboards on ZMK, allowing you to conveniently and quickly turn an idea into a ready-made layout. This article describes the procedure for connecting keymap-editor and its main features from the perspective of both a new user just beginning to delve into the world of split keyboards, and someone already familiar with split keyboards and configuring layouts in Vial.
